name: Queen of Seas
description: “Queen of Seas” is a casual platformer game. The game theme is about Yemanjá, the Queen of Seas in afro-brazilian religion. You play as a fisherman’s son, that need to dive deep and deliver offerings to the Queen of Seas poof his family’s faith.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 10 Processor: Pentium Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 10 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon or GeForce graphic card Storage: 300 MB available space
